cookingTips: Sauté garlic and onion in olive oil until fragrant before combining with beets to build flavor

enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user build a vibrant beet salad by aromatic-sautéing garlic and onion, combining with earthy beets and tangy feta, then seasoning to taste for a balanced, colorful dish.
